entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
